website_summaries.verdict: The best diaper bag on the market given its comfortable shoulder strap, overall size, and durability. Well worth the investment.
pros: Offers a spacious main compartment and a generous amount of storage options
cons: A bit tight when fully packed

customer_reviews.title: A Teacher's Secret Weapon!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and actually use this bag as my everyday teacher bag. It doesn't look like a diaper bag, which is nice. It's sturdy and made well. I use it to store my laptop, charger, assorted cords and cables and adapters, students' papers, my water bottle, makeup, and wallet. It cleans easily and it's just terrific. The insulation works to protect my laptop, too- and it keeps condensation from my water bottle away from electronics
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Mari

customer_reviews.title: Which it wax just and inch or 2 wider
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this bag. It's pretty and I like that I'm not carrying around a cartoon covered bag. It had a bunch of pockets which help keep me organzied. Easy to wipe clean as well. My FAVORITE thing about this is the stroller straps. I use them all the time, on my stroller and on shopping carts. So why the 3 stars? The size. I wish it was just 2 inches wider. It would fit so much more that way I mean babies take A LOT of crap to get through a trip or day. It is taller which is nice but then you end up digging around and removing items to find things in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a lot of great features like being able to attach it to a stroller, the front hook eye to clip keys/etc. to, the included changing pad, and just the right amount of pockets, but overall, I just found it to be too small and difficult to access/view my items in the bag. The bag should be slightly wider and allow the opening at the top to be larger so you can easily see/access the items. Ended up finding a larger bag by a different brand for baby number two and realized just how frustrated I had been with the Skip hop Duo. Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, smart diaper bag- no identity crisis!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, not trying to be what it’s not. Stroller strap is brilliant and easy to use on shopping carts, too. Perfect for quick trip out or a day away- love the exterior pockets and the “secret” zipper pocket on top— great spot for my phone! Only cons: small changing pad and I wish there was clip on a string for my keys, maybe a thermal pocket inside for warm bottles.
customer_reviews.author: L Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. It's not huge, but it is big enough to hold all of my little one's necessities. I wouldn't recommend this bag for multiples. I also bought the Pronto Changing Station, and it fits in the main compartment of this bag nicely. I can fit a receiving blanket, 3-4 changes of clothes, and bottles in this bag easily with my Pronto bag containing the diapers and wipes fitting on top. It has plenty of pockets on the outside which I love. The two side compartments are perfect for holding bottles, and the front compartments are good for storing mom's phone/keys/Chapstick etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but man or man!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent other then the fact that you lose space as you fill up the pockets. Haha. The way the bag is designed is its about a 4" wide base and tapers to a 2.75" opening so because of that you actually lose space and the opening to me is tight when reaching in with both hands. This is the newer bag too. Skip Hop needs to designe the bag 4" all the up and it would be perfect. Really wanted the messenger one with the flap but I heard and saw it did not seal and stuff could easily fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Good bag and cool look
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag and cool look! I’m giving 4 stars and not 5 just because the stroller clips are very wide and they do not work well on my stroller (Inglesina aptica), so I have to place the bag in the lower storage space instead of hanging it.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!  PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! Originally bought the Skip Hop Dash Messenger Bag, but it was just too small so I exchanged for this one and I'm loving it. I don't find it to be too small...it's not an overnight bag, I use my Skip Hop Bento Bag for that because it's huge. I fit all my baby things and have room for my things as well, so I use it as my everyday bag. The style is cute and durable, and I love that it's tall I can fit a magazine in the back sleeve or my tablet and still have room for everything else. I open it and can easily find stuff even on the bottom. Great bag, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: I do really enjoy this bag
customer_reviews.text: I do really enjoy this bag. I like the design and colors. It doesn't look tacky. I do find that I wish I had just a bit more room. That may be just because I over-pack in general, but I always find myself stuffing things in there or trying to reorganize everything so it all fits. I do have a 2-year-old and a 3-month-old so that is a factor as well. So long as you're not packing for two kids still in diapers, this bag is probably perfect.
customer_reviews.author: masonsr

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy this bag again. Not only did I find the bag to have a great look, but it is very durable and spacious. I am notorious for over packing and there so many useful pockets and space to allow me to comfortably do this. It is very light weight and comfortable to carry around. I have had several diaper bags in the past when I had my son and I was never happy with any of them whether is was quality or space, I could never find one that worked with me. I wish I found this bag sooner, because it is exactly what I had needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris  Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag !
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's not so bulky. It's easy to carry or put over shoulder. Love the straps to clip on stroller handle or on shopping cart. I like the compartments, great for keeping baby items organized. Easy to clean up spills had a few baby milk leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a better organized bag now
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked very well for us until my son reached 6months. It’s just too small for our needs. I wish it was lightly wider and had another interior set of interior pockets. I end up having to layer the inside which gets all messed up by the time we are heading home. Looking for a better organized bag now. It is very durable and I’ll use it for shorter times out or for a stays in the car bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trippe

customer_reviews.title: Used product, good size and storage
customer_reviews.text: Got for a reduced price as an open box item, item has been clearly used, spots on inside and outside of bag, even used gum wrapper inside. Good size and I like the design but, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Destiney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is extremely nice! It seems to be excellent quality material, well made, and very fashionable; numerous pockets and compartments of all sizes make it perfect for a new mom and it would be easy to clean. I found the bag in stores, but Amazon has the best price. That said, I had to return the bag because my DIL had already selected another one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Singletons or Quick Errands
customer_reviews.text: I love the print on this bag. The strips are slightly off white (not bright white) and it bridges the world of babies and working professionals for the perfect bag for a working mom. There are ample pockets for organizing your needs. We have twins and can only use this bag for shorter trips out of the house. If you are packing for two for a full day or more, you will want a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: ... diaper bags and this one is by far the best! I love how it attaches to the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of diaper bags and this one is by far the best! I love how it attaches to the back of the stroller, but it does make it too heavy and will tip the stroller over if I take the baby out before I remove the bag. Overall, it's a sturdy bag and has enough room for what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hold a ton, love the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I cloth diaper which takes up more space. I also tend to brig everything but the kitchen sink so I love that this bag has so many pockets. My husband previous bought a fancy Michael Kors diaper bag but I like the cheaper versions (like this one) SO much more because let's face it- the designer bags just aren't functional!
customer_reviews.author: LW963

customer_reviews.title: In love with this diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diaper bag! It is the perfect size and is amazing quality. The straps are wonderful with being able to use the shorter ones or the adjustable longer one. We got the chevron grey and white print, and it’s still a cute print with both my husband and I being able to use it. I have definitely referred a few friends to purchase a Skip Hop bag!
customer_reviews.author: Ride907

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag with LOTS of pockets to keep everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag with LOTS of pockets to keep everything in its place. Comes with a padded changing pad. My favorite aspect is the snaps where the strap attaches that allows it to be hooked directly onto the stroller! We use this feature all the time. It is deep so if you just throw something in, it may not be easy to find it, if you aren't taking some things out.
customer_reviews.author: dogdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great product and does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy about this bag. It is affordable and has plenty of pockets for everything. I am, however, not a diaper bag snob and love just about whatever. I do hope it holds up for a long time. It seems like the quality is pretty great so this should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag, terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and design of this diaper bag, lots of storage and has an adjustable strap as well as straps to attach to stroller handle. My only reason for three stars is that this product had a TERRIBLE smell. After I received it, I hung it outside everyday for two weeks, and kept it by an open window at night. After two weeks, we needed to use it. It still smelled, so I stuck dryer sheets in all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: MissKate

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag it's so perfect. Im glad it got here today. It is huge but it also fits everything i need and my son needs. I should of got it since day one 😒. Highly recommend it. Fabric n everything is well done. 60$ is well worth it. I just don't know what are the inside side pockets for lol. Other than that perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Martinez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: it's so perfect for a mom with a baby
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this bag!! It has so much room, pockets, it's so perfect for a mom with a baby, I use the front zipper compartment for my wallet, there is a hidden small zipper pocket near the big main one that is perfect for keys. It has 4 bottle pockets, two on the sides and 2 in the front, and that's great for both baby's bottles and my water bottle. It's washable- I threw it in the washing machine. And after a year plus still looks new!! Love this ❤
customer_reviews.author: levi g.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister. She loved it!! The little changing mat is a really nice touch. It's also a really good size, and not giant like some of the other bags I'd seen around. Why do people have to carry to much crap when they have a baby? Anyways, this is a great bag and looks like a normal bag too.
customer_reviews.author: samguerreiro

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says and great product not cheap well built good price
customer_reviews.author: BORGZ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for the perfect diaper bag. I love this bag! It's the perfect size, ample storage compartments without being too big. Hangs easily on my stroller. Large enough padded shoulder strap to drape over my shoulder without being awkward. Looks nice and easy to wipe clean. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hess

customer_reviews.title: The bag is pretty awesome! I love the pockets and the zipper
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty awesome! I love the pockets and the zipper! It fits quite a bit and is a great bag that both my husband and I will carry, so no need for multiple bags! My only complaint is how skinny it is. It would be so much better if the base were just a bit wider. It makes it hard if you put too many blankets or larger cloth items in the bag.otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had many diaper bags, this one by far tops them all. Just the right size, and has a pocket for everything! I don't like to carry huge bags around and this one is great. Enough room for everything I need. I am very happy with this purchase and I don't plan on buying any new diaper bags any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Burch

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bag
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd go at a diaper bag from Amazon. The first was a popular brand that I see a lot of moms carrying. The quality of the original was terrible and I shipped it back the very same day. I've never personally bought anything Skip Hop, but was attracted to this bag only for its chevrons. It's a terrific bag. I like the magnetic clasp on the front pockets, and the cell phone pockets. The two side pockets are perfect for almost any beverage (except hot coffee ;) ).
customer_reviews.author: ala_mama

customer_reviews.title: I love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag!! It's such a cute design and has tons of little storage pockets which I love! I do wish it was a little wider like a standard diaper bag, but after some creative re-arranging, I was able to get all the essentials to fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B.

customer_reviews.title: Material is great but the size was not useful
customer_reviews.text: Only use for one time ! I purchase the bag for my babysitter! She said that it was too big size when we hangout with baby girl! Material is great but the size was not useful!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy chen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, they thought of all the mommy needs
customer_reviews.text: So mazing! Great bag, they thought of all the mommy needs, and just made a great bag! Love this, my wife loves it and I will pass it along after we are done with it because its in near perfect condition still.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Best price for this bag was found on Amazon. This bag is stylish and all the pockets make it easy to keep the bag organized. Having the option with the handle or strap make it nice too. Best diaper bag I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The print is beautiful and the materials are high quality
customer_reviews.text: This bag has quite a bit of room to bring along the essentials for baby. I'm not a light packer by any means and this bag allows me to pack what I think we may need for our trips out. The print is beautiful and the materials are high quality. I love this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: jodie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love the two pockets on the inside. It was difficult finding pictures, but it does have two pockets on the inside on one side of the bag. Love that you can actually put it on the stroller, or I put it on the handle of the shopping cart. Plenty of pockets, nice and light. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AZmom

customer_reviews.title: This bag is amazing. The set up of the pockets and compartments ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing. The set up of the pockets and compartments is more than perfect. I have room for everything plus some and the phone pocket is so convenient to grab your phone when you need it. I have recommended this diaper bag to everyone I know. We had the Diaper Dude before and it worked just fine but I wanted something for me this time round and it far exceeds the diaper dude.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Love that is has lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Baby boy. Love that is has lots of compartments. Bag can be carried many different ways & can also be clipped on to your stroller. Chevron color is great for both girl or boy. If you are worried about any stains, the bag can be easily cleaned with soap & warm water. I have even thrown in the washer a few times (Without the Straps) and I have had no problems. I would greatly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Roomy bag. It gets the job done. I wish that it came with book bag straps, but all in all, it’s a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this bag and recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is totally worth the price. We love this bag and recommend it to anyone, it's very big and has two different ways to carry one with your hang and one over the shoulder, it has several pockets in several different sized and i believe its waterproof material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it can clip onto a shopping cart or ...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bag!! I love that it can clip onto a shopping cart or stroller handle. I've had it for about a year and it has held up really well. Plenty of pockets to keep things organized. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it and after I'm past the diaper bag years I could see myself still using it for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie D Ventura

customer_reviews.title: and a great product, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and a great product, good quality. I especially love the fact that you can attach it to your stroller, is very comfortable and great for long walks. It's very spacious and has many compartments. Overall great diaper bag at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Randompete

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS DIAPER BAG
customer_reviews.text: I am a FTM and went out on a limb to get this bag, I do a lot of reviewing. No mistake here, this is great. There are pockets on the inside, pockets on the outside, a number isn't important, but it has enough, that's for sure. Great bag, quality material. Seems it will last a long time, easy cleanup for spills too!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The bag is ok, thought it would be better with all the great reviews. Surprised to see how small the main compartment is. I guess if you are looking for a smaller diaper bag this would work well for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! The padding on the strap is extremely comfortable which was important since I love to leave the house with more than what I need for my little one. Fits a lot without bulging up and sitting comfortably on my shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Janessy

customer_reviews.title: Good diaper bag to use on a daily basis like ...
customer_reviews.text: Good diaper bag to use on a daily basis like going to the store, but quite small for a long run. The main pocket is not really big. The quality is great and the model looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Doom Marie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. It's not huge, so you can't pack too much into it, but I'm totally okay with that. It has a lot of pockets to keep things organized. I would HIGHLY recommend this bad to any mom. Also, I get compliments on it all The time.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: My favorite diaper bag by far!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was contemplating on getting this as I don't normally spend this kind of money on bags, but I was sold on the stroller and cart clip. Now I just clip the bag to the grocery cart instead of putting in the cart, leaving no space for groceries. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE BAG
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE BAG, BUT ORDERED THE WET/DRY BAG AND BOTTLE HOLDER AT A LATER DATE AND THEY HAVE MORE OF A WHITE BACKGROUND AND THE DIAPER BAG IS MORE OF AN IVORY/OFF WHITE BACKGROUND. I HATE HAVING THEM NEXT TO EACH OTHER BECAUSE IT MAKES THE DIAPER BAG LOOK DIRTY OR SMOKE STAINED AND WE ARE NOT SMOKERS OR DIRTY!!!! IT'S KIND OF EMBARRASSING, BUT I LIKE THE PRODUCTS SO I FEEL I HAVE TO KEEP USING THEM.
customer_reviews.author: VIC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Everyone loves it, I always get compliments. It holds everything you will need. It is a little on the smaller side of diaper bags and might not fit everything for a long trip, but day to day errands it is perfect for!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Can Fit So Much !  Nice Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just love the size of this bag, has many compartments and fits the stroller ; I like the color very much Much larger than I expected. Very happy with it for traveling, the mall, etc. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: LearningDee

customer_reviews.title: Great slim messenger style baby bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! The reason I got this is because I wanted a slim bag that is cute and doesn't scream diaper bag. I don't carry too much when going out with baby because we usually don't venture too far away from home. My usual bag contents are a couple bottles of milk, a swaddle/ light blanket, wipes, hand sanitizer, lotion, a onesie. This fits with plenty of room to spare. If you carry a lot when going out, you would need a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Ting Xie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! Perfect size and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: We love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: We love this diaper bag! It's got tons of pockets and will be what we used until our son is walking and able to carry a little back pack! It's perfect for toting our diapers, wipes, and bottles around in!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Solstad

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with her choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter as my grandson is due in November! She is very happy with her choice. Our first grandson is nearly four and she felt like she needed a black diaper bag but this grey chevron would be great for a boy or girl!
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Big, beautiful, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets, lots of room to fit everything baby and I need for our outing with room to spare. Great material, easy to keep clean. Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vilaysack

customer_reviews.title: I love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! After trying a few different brands i stick to Skip Hop. I love that it;s not too big but big enough to fit in everything you need for a baby. I got mine in chevron and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Dinka

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a Petunia Pickle bottom to this bag and I love it. My favorite thing is the pockets. It is so easy to stay organized with this bag. There is plenty of space for everything I need and it has held up great even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: KynleighsMom

customer_reviews.title: I love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. It is easy to clean and can store a lot of baby gear. It's not an obvious diaper bag and I can see myself using this as a laptop bag when we no longer need it for the baby. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: jy24

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many diaper bags and this one is the only one that has held up. Strong and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this bag! We've got compliments, love all the compartments, especially the hidden ones for phone and debit card. I needed something to stay organized and yet not overly large- this fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Murguia

customer_reviews.title: I really like the bag however I wish it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bag however I wish it was a little bigger. It is hard to get at things at the bottom of the bag... it’s tall and deep however wishing I would have found one that was wider to get at the bottom easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag for Dad too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bag. Build quality is good and it’s roomy enough for plenty of baby/parent gear. It also styled with dads in mind as well as moms.
customer_reviews.author: dutch

customer_reviews.title: I love how fashionable this bag is but is still also ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how fashionable this bag is but is still also completely functional at the same time. I like the way the pockets are set up more than the backpack diaper bag I have. Everything is easily accessible and the strap length is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jassy

customer_reviews.title: The shoulder strap seems like it will be a handy feature when carrying it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected. I just filled it and have it reedy for the hospital. The shoulder strap seems like it will be a handy feature when carrying it around for a long period. The stroller straps will be a nice feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Kasperek

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality but I didn't find it very functional
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good quality but I didn't find it very functional, at least for the newborn stage anyways! Very slim and hard to get something out of the bottom with completely making a mess of the rest of the items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this diaper bag just under a year now. It is so narrow, it can’t hold near the things you need when you leave for the afternoon. Not to mention how hard it is to clean. We wash it about 1x per month and it still has stains from being carried, Set in the floor, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I found this bag too small to be functional. I can only see this working for very brief day trips (an hour or two). It also does not lend itself to being too organized. I sent it back promptly. Also, the color is not pure grey and white, rather has faded spaces which is not terribly attractive.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and easy to carry but I'm having a hard time fitting ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to carry but I'm having a hard time fitting everything I need for a new baby. Which seems to keep adding up as he gets older. Not sure how much longer I'll be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: S  Kathleen Nylin

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy material! We brought it on the plane to ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy material! We brought it on the plane to travel to Indonesia last month. Roomy to brings baby stuff while on the plane for more than 20 hours!
customer_reviews.author: lemonade30

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for 9 months now. It's a great bag. My only complaint is that it's a bit on the narrow side. A bit more space would be great, but it works for day to day relatively well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great look, matches pictures from Amazon product. Pockets, zippers, magnets, mesh all are very utilitarian while still stylish looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product, my daughter has this and uses it ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, my daughter has this and uses it al the time. I saw it on a baby gift registry and snapped it up right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like many features of the diaper bag. I wish there were more pockets inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: First of all, i really do like this bag!! It has alot of compartments, everything i carry for the baby fits in there with space to spare. I usually carry 8 diapers, travel wipe case, emergency kit, mommy essentials, a few toys, hand wipes for both baby and me, extra outfit, extra swaddle balnket, phone and keys!! Everything fit nicely in the 10 pockets! The strollers straps we're awesome (reason why i purchased). The shoulder strap was comfortable! I did end up returning it because i found a better price elsewhere(reason why i took a star off) otherwise, this is the best diaper bag!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: NDAL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the design and LOVE the practicality!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this diaper bag! Not only is it super cute but it is very practical (which let's face it----that's what really matters). We only have one little one and this diaper bag is the perfect size for us! I love that is compact and very easy to organize. It probably would be too small for more than one babe, so I wouldn't recommend purchasing this if you plan on packing it for plus 1. Definetly one of my favorite purchases for the baby!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Skip the designer bags, this bag is IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this diaper bag for my third child and I LOVE it! I've been through several bags and finally found one that really works for me. And the thing that really sets it apart? The zippered cellphone/car key pocket. It's amazing! I can have all my baby gear in place in the big compartment (which has all kinds of great storage) and not have to dig through it all to get my phone or keys. They're right there at the top in their own pocket. Love it! Also, the color/print is just perfect. It is closer to gray and ivory just FYI. Do yourself a favor and skip the overpriced designer bags!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah E

customer_reviews.title: Diaper purse
customer_reviews.text: Pricewise it is a tad spend, but it is great quality and has tons of pockets. Holds up a lot better then other bags we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag! I've been carrying it for over a month now and have no complaints. I love all the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer89

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. great product. Wish it was a little bigger. But It's okay.
customer_reviews.author: osamaalenizi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bag but too small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bag but too small. I carry a big wallet and it took up too much space, just too narrow. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: and seems like a good size
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely cute, has strong material, and seems like a good size, but when u put stuff in there, there is not enough room inside. I just wish it was easier to access the inside n a little bigger. I have a backup diaper bag that's not as cute by far but it is more practical...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Lots of pockets and lots of room. I had my niece put KNOX's name in big Red letters and everyone LOVES the bag when they see it. Its made really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: acoolmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag perfect for baby and mommy
customer_reviews.text: Love my bag just wish it had an insulated compartment and longer stroller clips.
customer_reviews.author: NYC2TX

customer_reviews.title: Makes organizing easy. Traded in a bigger bag for this one
customer_reviews.text: Makes organizing easy. Traded in a bigger bag for this one, but feel like I'm still able to carry just as much. The pockets and compartments make it easy to find items I need in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing and I can't wait to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R.

customer_reviews.title: Great, we returned it because it was purchased by my husband and he has no taste... at least he tried.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda bulky, but otherwise lots of room and cute looking bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jondafun

customer_reviews.title: Spacious easy to clean and great design!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag!! It’s big enough to fit all the things I need inside! Fabric is very easy to clean!! I love the padded strap!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy the stroller clips are
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. When I got it I wanted one for myself. Love how easy the stroller clips are. The pockets are great. My friend is loving it! If I had to give it a con I wish it was a bit lengthier and not as tall.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love his bag! It's not too big or too small. There's also plenty of pockets to keep everything organized!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: To much good stuff to write about this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: To much good stuff to write about this diaper bag. I love it. If you're looking for stylish, durable, affordable and name brand then this is your bag.
customer_reviews.author: MelSB

customer_reviews.title: The bag is on the narrow side but we love all the pockets and it fits what we need ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is on the narrow side but we love all the pockets and it fits what we need when on the go with our 14 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality!~
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL! loved this bag and its a great size and all lined. I would like a beach bag version of this!
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Its a great bag, has plenty of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Its a great bag, has plenty of pockets, nice adjustable strap, easy to clean, i just wish the main inside pocket was wider.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag- I think I will continue to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag- I think I will continue to use it as a work bag after I no longer need it as a diaper bag. So many well placed pockets. Love the addition of handles and zipper compared to the previous version.
customer_reviews.author: Marzipannie

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper bag. Lots of pockets to keep organized. Love the pocket for my cell phone, I have a iPhone 6 plus do it's nice that it actually fits in there. The best part is that you can hook it to the push bar on your stroller. That is a life saver. It's really cute, I've gotten compliments on it. The long strap is really comfortable over the shoulder. Some people think the main pocket is too deep, and I guess it is deep but I don't see what the big deal is. I put less useful stuff on the bottom like a spare change of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: CliffySkogs

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! When baby no longer needs a diaper bag, I'll continue to use it. It's stylish and roomy. The perfect bag for a lady on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a baby gift and the person I bought it for loves it
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jean Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Very stylish. Might be a bit small if you have lots of kids or stuff to carry, but works great for my baby's stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my four month old. It's great for day trips out and back but I'm either over packing or not organized. If I was going to be out for about 12+ hours this does not hold everything I need it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Plenty of room for essential things and extras if we need them! really comfortable to wear also!
customer_reviews.author: Mikella B. Maine

product_meta.title: Skip Hop Diaper Bag: Iconic Duo Signature Function Forward Tote with Changing Pad & Stroller Attachement, Chevron
product_meta.description: The updated Duo Signature boasts a bevy of new features that moms and dads have requested. The new zip-top closure ensures belongings stay securely in the bag. We added tote handles for versatility and an easy-access tech pocket. The new front panel design allows for more storage and stability while keeping items at the bottom of the bag easily accessible. The Duo Signature still has all the classic components of the original including our patented shuttle clips that easily convert it from a shoulder bag to a stroller bag. Signature is a classic redesign for the next generation of parents. -Main compartment has zip closure -10 pockets -Two elasticized, mesh side pockets fit most bottles -Front zip pocket and easy access tech pocket -Grab handles and adjustable shoulder strap with slip-on shoulder pad (adjusts from approx. 27" to 50") -Vegan leather trim (Grey Melange & Soft Slate only) -Custom hardware with d-ring for toys or pacifier pocket -Contrasting lining for easy visibility -Patented shuttle clips and nonslip stroller straps -Holds tablets and laptops up to 15" -Includes machine washable cushioned changing pad; size unfolded (inches): 23.5l x 12h; (cm): 60l x 30h; folded (inches): 8l x 12h; (cm): 20l x 30h -BPA-Free, Phthalate-Free -Weight: 1.3 lbs. -Size (inches): 13l x 6w x 14h; (cm): 33l x 15w x 35.5h Fabric & Care -Polyester -Spot clean with damp cloth & mild detergen
feature_bullets: The updated Duo Signature boasts a bevy of new features that moms and dads have requested: zip-top closure ensures belongings stay securely in the diaper bag, tote handles for versatility and an easy-access tech pocket.
New front panel design allows for more storage and stability while keeping items at the bottom of the bag easily accessible.
The redesigned Duo Signature still has all the classic components of the original including our patented shuttle clips that easily convert it from a shoulder bag to a stroller bag.
11 total pockets including two mesh side bottles, front zip pocket, easy access pocket and machine washable cushioned changing pad.
Patented shuttle clips, nonslip stroller straps, BPA-free, Phthalate-free
Four interior slip pockets. Seven exterior pockets
